name: tools-suite
description: Tests shared agent tools (readFile, writeFile, listFiles)

agent.name: ToolTestAgent
agent.instructions: You are an assistant that tests file tools. Use the tools provided to complete tasks. After using a tool, report results concisely.

cases.name: writeFile creates a file
cases.prompt: Write the text 'Hello World' to a file called 'agent-evals/tool-test-output.txt'

assertions.description: File should contain the written text

cases.name: readFile reads file content
cases.prompt: Read the file 'agent-evals/tool-test-output.txt' and tell me its contents

assertions.description: Agent response should include the file contents

cases.name: listFiles shows directory contents
cases.prompt: List the files in the tmp/agent-evals directory

assertions.description: Agent response should include the previously created file

cases.name: writeFile with JSON content
cases.prompt: Write a JSON file called 'agent-evals/tool-test-data.json' with this exact content: {"name": "test", "value": 42}
